what: Check Access on an Individual Section or Topic
title: Manage LearnR Tutorials
text: Description GET request checks user can access given topic /section. Trigger student clicks either “Next Topic” “Continue” buttons. Parameters - topic: topic id, format section-header-2-name. example, (## Topic 1) becomes (section-topic-1). - section: section id, format section-header-3-name. example, (### Exercise 1) becomes (section-exercise-1). - type=1: temporary variable identifies GET request’s purpose. future update replace variable actual endpoint. Return - can_proceed: Notes - “Continue” button shown progressive reveal set. - GET requests sent checking exercise can skipped.
code: https://Your.Server.com?type=1&topic=${topic.id}&section=${section.id} -   TRUE - The topic/section CAN be accessed. -   FALSE - The topic/section CANNOT be accessed.
